```{r 01020202setup, include=FALSE}
## 01020202 ->- Population standard deviation  from csv file.
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
signifDig <- 4

n = sample(100:500, 1)
data = c(sample(1:30, n, replace=TRUE))
(dataDF = data.frame(x=data))

(fileName = paste0("data", paste0(sample(c(LETTERS, 0:9), 10), collapse = ""), ".csv", collapse = ""))
write.table(dataDF, file = fileName, sep = " ", row.names = FALSE)

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION
(sol = sqrt((n - 1) * var(data) / n))

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))
```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("Find the **population standard deviation** of the set of numbers in the attached file.")

answer=paste0("The answer is ",
  sol
)

```


```{r eval=(language == "es"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

"Calcula la **desviación típica poblacional** del conjunto de números del fichero adjunto.")

answer=paste0("La respuesta es ", sol)
```
